  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_477</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_477</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Curvas y superficies</string>
            <string language="en">Curves and surfaces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurven und Oberflächen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courbes et surfaces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curvas e superfícies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Curve e superfici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμπύλες και επιφάνειες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones algunas curvas y superficies en el espacio. Se estudian las ecuaciones paramétricas de curvas y algunas superficies, como hélices y cilindros. También se estudia la ecuación reducida de la superficie esférica.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to show some curves and surfaces in three-dimensional space. It studies the parametric equations of the curves and some surfaces such as helices and cylinders. It also studies the reduced equation of a spherical surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">superficies</string>
            <string language="en">surfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cilindro</string>
            <string language="en">cylinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">esfera</string>
            <string language="en">sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">curvas</string>
            <string language="en">curves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, etwas Kurven und Oberflächen im dreidimensionalen Platz
zu zeigen. Er studiert die parametrischen Gleichungen der Kurven
und etwas Oberflächen wie Schnecken und Zylinder. Er studiert 
auch die verringerte Gleichung einer kugelförmigen Oberfläche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de montrer quelques courbes et surfaces dans l'espace 
tridimensionnel. Il étudie les équations paramétriques des 
courbes et de certaines surfaces telles que des spirales et des 
cylindres. Il étudie également l'équation réduite d'une 
surface sphérique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações mostrar 
algumas curvas e superfícies no espaço tridimensional. Estuda 
as equações paramétricas das curvas e de algumas superfícies tais 
como hélices e cilindros. Estuda também a equação reduzida 
de uma superfície esférica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
mostrare alcune curve e superfici nello spazio tridimensionale. 
Studia le equazioni parametriche delle curve e di alcune 
superfici quali le eliche ed i cilindri. Egualmente studia 
l'equazione ridotta di una superficie sferica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εμφανίσει μερικές καμπύλες και επιφάνειες στο τρισδιάστατο
διάστημα. Μελετά τις παραμετρικές εξισώσεις των καμπυλών 
και μερικών επιφανειών όπως οι έλικες και οι κύλινδροι. 
Μελετά επίσης τη μειωμένη εξίσωση μιας σφαιρικής 
επιφάνειας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oberflächen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zylinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
